# 本周学习的知识分享
### 鸡藕椒盐味
题目谐音”奇偶校验位“，先将二进制倒置得到打印前的验证码，再用海明校验码改正

![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2024/jpeg/49639454/1732194067473-6e41b4fa-a926-4cc4-88ac-cb188428718d.jpeg)

再将该二进制倒置得到打印后的验证码，用MD5加密得到flag

flag{d14084c7ceca6359eaac6df3c234dd3b}

[海明校验码原理解析](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1P64y1478p/?spm_id_from=333.337.search-card.all.click&vd_source=c57a87a873654ad899ea9238ea21d79d)

### easymath
```plain
import gmpy2 as gp
import binascii

def getkey(length):
    if length < 1:
        return 0

    dp = [[0, 0] for _ in range(length + 1)]
    dp[0][0] = 1
    dp[0][1] = 0
    dp[1][0] = 0
    dp[1][1] = 1

    for n in range(2, length + 1):
        dp[n][0] = dp[n - 1][1] + dp[n - 1][0]
        dp[n][1] = dp[n - 1][0] + dp[n - 1][1]

        if n >= 4:
            dp[n][1] -= dp[n - 4][0]
            dp[n][0] -= dp[n - 4][1]

    return dp[length][1]

length = 2331
key = getkey(length)



e=65537

p=gp.next_prime(key)
q=n//p
phi=(p-1)*(q-1)
d=gp.invert(e,phi)
m=pow(c,d,n)
print(binascii.unhexlify(hex(m)[2:]))
```

flag{77310934-21fa-4ee4-a783-dc1865ebab28}
